subject: 2019 GEASC – Invite you to join Tokyo exploring Tour
body:
Dear Delegate(s),   Greetings from 2019 GEASC Global Engineering & Applied Science Conference Secretariat. We sincerely invite you to join Tokyo exploring tour. This exploring tour includes the world famous Mt. Fuji and the beautiful Lake Kawaguchi. Join us now for this wonderful and amazing trip. The detail for Tokyo exploring Tour as follows: HERE                                    Mt. Fuji                                         Oishi Park                                             Lake Kawaguchi   Please visit the conference website for submit your paper and join us.  Conference website: http://geasc-conf.org/ Registration Deadline : June 30, 2019 To sign up or submit your paper, please click "HERE"   Regards,      GEASC Conference Secretariat Global Engineering & Applied Science Conference http://geasc-conf.org    You are currently subscribed to our list with the following address: foaad@calpoly.edu. If you no longer want to receive our emails, you can click unsubscribe. Email delivery powered by 電子豹 NewsLeopard.

Dear Delegate(s),

 

Greetings from 2019 GEASC Global Engineering & Applied Science Conference Secretariat. We sincerely invite you to join Tokyo exploring tour.

This exploring tour includes the world famous Mt. Fuji and the beautiful Lake Kawaguchi.

Join us now for this wonderful and amazing trip.

The detail for Tokyo exploring Tour as follows: HERE

 

             

                   Mt. Fuji                                         Oishi Park                                             Lake Kawaguchi

 

Please visit the conference website for submit your paper and join us. 

Conference website: http://geasc-conf.org/

Registration Deadline : June 30, 2019

To sign up or submit your paper, please click "HERE"

 

Regards, 

 

 

GEASC Conference Secretariat

Global Engineering & Applied Science Conference

http://geasc-conf.org 

 

You are currently subscribed to our list with the following address: foaad@calpoly.edu. If you no longer want to receive our emails, you can click unsubscribe.
Email delivery powered by 電子豹 NewsLeopard.
